attributes.action: ignore the petition to repeal the hunting act 2004
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems the hunting fraternity have been busy gathering the masses to try to get the government to repeal the hunting act 2004. I think its fair if we also have the opportunity to ask the government to leave this legislation in place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ignore the petition to repeal the hunting act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13976.asp

Prime Minister's Office
